definitions.body: images of tumours and mice (of gold) 1Sa 6:5, 1Sa 6:5, 1Sa 6:11; esp. of heathen gods Am 5:26 (text dub.; del. We as gloss, cf. GASm Dr), 2Ki 11:18 = 2Ch 23:17 (both c. vb. [[שִׁבְּרוּ]]), Ez Eze 7:20, so [[זָכָר]] ´[[ח]] Eze 16:17 (i.e. in male form, acc. to fig. of harlotry for idolatry); [[מַסֵכׂתָם]] Nu 33:52 their molten images; of painted pictures of men Ez Eze 23:14.

image, likeness, of resemblance, ´[[בְּ]] ([[בָּרָא]]) [[עָשָׂה]], of God's making man in his own image, Ge 1:26(‖[[כִּדְמוּתֵנוּ ]]), v:Ge 1:27, v:Ge 1:27, Ge 9:6, ´[[כְּ]] Ge 5:3 (‖[[בִּדְמוּתוֹ ]]; all P).
fig. = mere, empty, image, semblance, ´[[בְּח]] Ps 39:7 as ([[ב]] essentiae) a (mere) semblance man walks about; [[חַלְמָם תִּבְזֶה]] Ps 73:20 thou wilt despise their semblance.
